alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Gates of the Mountains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 09 at 10:43AM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Cascade County below 5000ft, Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass, and Gates of the Mountains. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.
